Carpentry

Capp and son offer a full carpentry service. Our services include:

  • fitted kitchens
  • hanging doors
  • banisters
  • door frames
  • stud walls
  • skirting boards
  • replacement floorings
  • boarding lofts
  • loft ladders
Call 01702 218640 or 07584 426382 for a bespoke carpentry quote, or simply email enquires@cappandson.co.uk
